title: Marcy Kaptur - Wikipedia
snippet: In 1982, while pursuing her doctorate degree, Kaptur was recruited by local Democratic leaders to run for Congress in Ohio's 9th district in the midterm elections. The seat was held by freshman Republican Ed Weber, who had unseated 26-year incumbent Lud Ashley two years earlier.

title: Ohio's 9th congressional district - Wikipedia
snippet: Ohio's 9th congressional district has been represented by Representative Marcy Kaptur (D) since 1983.

title: Ohio's 9th Congressional District - Ballotpedia
snippet: Kaptur was unopposed in the Democratic primary. Larson defeated Steven Kraus and Joel Lieske in the Republican primary on March 15, 2016.[1] See also: Ohio's 9th Congressional District elections, 2014 · The 9th Congressional District of Ohio held an election for the U.S. House of Representatives ...

title: Congresswoman Marcy Kaptur |Representing the 9th District of Ohio
snippet: Kaptur Statement On Federal Inaction From HHS And Impact On Toledo Teachers, Students, And Head Start Program ... Toledo, OH – Today, Congresswoman Marcy Kaptur (OH-09) released the following statement after the Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) failed to provide funding for Toledo Public Schools Head Start Program, causing the closure of the program effective immediately, today December 1st.

title: Marcy Kaptur - BW Center for Women and Politics in Ohio | Baldwin Wallace University
snippet: Marcy Kaptur serves in the U.S. House of Representatives, representing Ohio's 9th district.
